member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_PROTECTION_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the protection level for video content.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_PROTECTION_FLAGS.ProtectionEnabled
member.summary: If 1, video content protection is enabled.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_PROTECTION_FLAGS.OverlayOrFullscreenRequired
member.summary: If 1, the application requires video to be displayed using either a hardware overlay or full-screen exclusive mode.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_PROTECTION_FLAGS.Reserved
member.summary: Reserved. Set all bits to zero.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_PROTECTION_FLAGS.Value
member.summary: Use this member to access all of the bits in the union.
